mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_review (pno, mid, rating, review_content) VALUES (#{pno}, #{mid}, #{rating}, #{reviewContent})
mapper.select: SELECT rno, mid, rating, review_content, regDate, modDate FROM tbl_review WHERE pno = #{pno} ORDER BY rno DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tbl_review WHERE rno = #{rno} AND mid = #{mid}
